title: instance will not delete when failing to bind vif's

comments.content: can you please give some more information about your setup?  Which version of OpenStack are you using?  What are the steps to reproduce this bug?  Can you provide logs from Nova?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sross-7

comments.content:
The setup is the TripleO ci-overcloud. We are running icehouse-ish, but
we haven't updated in some time:

commit 82b4e9f0ec3d4c553d77abd1637e37395c6693cc
Merge: e6f027d 4d2bd3f
Author: Jenkins <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Feb 7 01:54:46 2014 +0000

    Merge "Fixed naming issue of variable in a debug statement
    formatting"

Happy to roll forward to a more recent commit if this is already a bug
that has been addressed since then.

We haven't seen this problem in a while, but I think a large part of it
was due to a giant flood of requests which arrived from nodepool and
overwhelmed neutron. Now that there is a constant slow churn we don't
see this particular ERROR state anymore.

Logs are tough, I think some of them have been purged. I'll try to get
some together.
